name: Lisa COPNEY, as Administratix of the Estate of Lawrence Copney Jr., Petitioner v. Edward MA, M.D., UPMC St. Margaret, and UPMC, Inc., Respondents

parties: Lisa COPNEY, as Administratix of the Estate of Lawrence Copney Jr., Petitioner v. Edward MA, M.D., UPMC St. Margaret, and UPMC, Inc., Respondents

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 4th day of October, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
158 A.3d 1229
Lisa COPNEY, as Administratix of the Estate of Lawrence Copney Jr., Petitioner v. Edward MA, M.D., UPMC St. Margaret, and UPMC, Inc., Respondents
